name: DogeZilla Ai
description: What is the project about? DogeZilla Ai is a new project that combines artificial intelligence and memes, as the project aims to create an artificial intelligence platform that is concerned with treating animals and providing all services to them. DogeZila Ai is a meme driven coin issued on the binance smart chain,that follows the example of other successful meme coins. What makes your project unique? The core of DogeZila Ai is to bring competitive player vs player(pvp) gamers to the crypto community. Due to the crypto gaming scene being dominated by [Play To Win] and [Play To Earn] games, DogeZila Ai is unique in the sense that we’ve designed the project in such a way that’s its both rewarding and fun so that you will wager your coins and increase your holdings of the coin. History of your project. The DogeZila Ai token project was launched in early March, 2023 by a team of 5 experienced crypto enthusiasts whose aim is to bring something revolutionary to the crypto gaming community. What’s next for your project? While at the same time having fun, we will be supporting NFTs at launch with the ability to buy,sell and trade within the game’s marketplace. After that, we would do the following: - Create a wallet for digital currencies, provide recommendations, a full explanation of how to enter crypto, explain the basics and concepts of digital currencies to reduce risks, and allocate monthly profits to all token holders and those who own the wallet. - Creating an artificial intelligence ( Ai ) platform that helps animal breeders to identify problems and diseases facing their animals by asking inquiries and questions on this platform, and the platform, through artificial intelligence, will provide possible solutions What can your token be used for? The DogeZila Ai can be used as a native currency in the game and the entire ecosystem.
